thread.title: Seven dead, 30 feared trapped after part of flyover collapses in Varanasi

title: Seven dead, 30 feared trapped after part of flyover collapses in Varanasi
text:
NEW DELHI (Reuters) - Seven people are dead and 30 others are feared trapped under the rubble after part of an under-construction flyover in Varanasi collapsed on Tuesday, a senior police official said.
Varanasi, the constituency of Prime Minister Narendra Modi, is in India’s most populous state of Uttar Pradesh and is popular among pilgrims and tourists.
Modi said on Twitter he was “extremely saddened” by the loss of lives and had asked officials in the state to provide all possible support to those affected.
Writing by Aditi Shah; Editing by Alison Williams
